title: Chicago Blues Festival
description: The world's largest free blues festival, featuring top-tier blues musicians in Millennium Park.

title: Printers Row Lit Fest
description: A celebration of books and literary culture with over 200 booksellers in the heart of Chicago.

title: Wells Street Art Festival
description: An outdoor art fair featuring local artists, live music, and food in the Old Town neighborhood.

title: Run for the Zoo
description: A 5K and 10K run through Lincoln Park Zoo to support wildlife conservation efforts.

title: Heatwave Music Festival
description: A two-day music festival featuring artists like Griz, Loud Luxury, and Slander at Huntington Bank Pavilion.

title: Stray Kids World Tour
description: K-pop sensations Stray Kids perform live at Wrigley Field as part of their 'dominATE' world tour.

title: Bud Billiken Parade and Picnic
description: The largest African-American parade in the U.S., celebrating youth and education with a festive picnic.
location: Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. Drive, Chicago, IL

title: Ruido Fest
description: A Latin American alternative music festival featuring artists from across the continent in Addams/Medill Park.

title: Windy City Smokeout
description: A BBQ, craft beer, and country music festival at the United Center, featuring top country artists.

title: Crosstown Classic: Cubs vs. White Sox
description: The annual rivalry series between Chicago's two Major League Baseball teams at Wrigley Field and Guaranteed Rate Field.

title: Nancy Faust Returns to Sox Park
description: Legendary White Sox organist Nancy Faust returns to perform at select Sunday games during the 125th anniversary season.

title: PFL 7: MMA Semifinals
description: Watch the Professional Fighters League's Middleweight and Lightweight semifinal bouts at Wintrust Arena.

title: Dave Matthews Band Concert
description: Experience the eclectic sounds of the Dave Matthews Band live at Huntington Bank Pavilion.

title: NASCAR Chicago Street Race
description: Witness high-speed action as NASCAR drivers race through the streets of downtown Chicago in this inaugural event.

title: Summer Saturday Fireworks at Navy Pier
description: Enjoy a spectacular fireworks display over Lake Michigan every Saturday night throughout the summer.
